# Candidate barrier compositions that exhibit 1% or less lattice mismatch on GaN
# and present extreme fields (>8 MV/cm) in 2 nm In0.3Ga0.7N quantum wells.
# These candidate compositions can be used as a starting point for tailoring the optical emission energy
# by tuning the well and barrier thicknesses.# The polarization fields were calculated for configurations with 18 nm barriers.
